listData.name: Everyday Account
listData.description: Your everyday transaction account with VISA Debit access.

features.additionalInfo: Members will be able to link Payid, receive and transfer money using PAYID from Hiver mobile application, if enabled
Secure Message to interact with the Bank
Web Chat to interact with customer representatives

features.additionalValue: Track payments with SMS and email alerts

features.additionalInfo: Our sweep service automatically transfers funds from certain savings accounts to cover most transactions which would otherwise exceed your transasction account's available balance.
Virtual card can be access on Hiver mobile application
Electronic statement only, generated six monthly

features.additionalValue: Push notifications via Hiver mobile application

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to citizens of Australia over age of 18 and are current or retired employees or volunteers in Education, Health Care or Emergency Services sectors or are family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of Hiver

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens of Australia.

fees.name: CARD_REPLACEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a replacement card.

fees.name: OVERDRAWN_ACCOUNT
fees.additionalInfo: Interest will be charged on the amount overdrawn, calculated for each day that the account is overdrawn and debited at the end of the month

fees.name: INTERNATIONAL_CONVERSION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: 2.90% of transaction value in $AUD collected by Cuscal Limited - 0.90% paid to Us; 1.00% retained by Cuscal; 1.00% paid to Visa International. Payable when you transact in a foreign currency using your Visa card either online or at a merchant point of sale (irrespective of where the transaction occurs; performed not in Australian Dollar; or overseas merchants transact in a foreign currency.)

fees.name: TELE_TRANSFER
fees.additionalInfo: Tele transfer within Australia to an account at another financial institution.

detailData.name: Everyday Account
detailData.description: Your everyday transaction account with VISA Debit access.

listData.name: Saver Account
listData.description: An interest bearing online savings account

features.additionalInfo: Bonus rate is earned for each month you make at least 1x deposit to the account each month and make no more than one withdrawal during that month
The savings account will attract a base rate of interest calculated daily, paid monthly and applied to the whole credit balance.
Members will be able to link Payid, receive and transfer money using PAYID from Hiver mobile application, if enabled
Secure Message to interact with the Bank
Web Chat to interact with customer representatives

features.additionalValue: Track payments with SMS and email alerts

features.additionalInfo: Our sweep service automatically transfers funds from certain savings accounts to cover most transactions which would otherwise exceed your transasction account's available balance.
Electronic statement only, generated six monthly

features.additionalValue: Push notifications via Hiver mobile application

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to citizens of Australia over age of 18 and are current or retired employees or volunteers in Education, Health Care or Emergency Services sectors or are family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens of Australia.

fees.name: OVERDRAWN_ACCOUNT
fees.additionalInfo: Interest will be charged on the amount overdrawn, calculated for each day that the account is overdrawn and debited at the end of the month

fees.name: TELE_TRANSFER_PROCESSING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: At Cost - Cuscal fee for processing payments and receipts of real time irrevocable cleared funds.
